summary: A mod that allows you to possess a Dwarven Centurion. Made by request of nivlevari123456789.
descriptionHtml:
Desc
___________
A mod that allows you to possess a Dwarven Centurion. Made by request of nivlevari123456789. If you want to transform, be sure to drink the blood of the wearwolf or else you would not be able to transform back.

Installation
___________________
Nexus Mod Manager
1) Click download with NMM

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory

Visit this website for game reviews
_____________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/

See my youtube channel

author: XGhostSlayer
